header.description: The DB2 plugin is an automation based plugin that provides steps for executing DB2 statements.

step-type.name: Run DB2 Script

property-ui.label: Script Body
property-ui.description: Enter the SQL script to execute. Choose either Script Body or Script File.

property-ui.label: Script File
property-ui.description: The path to a SQL script file to execute, including the script name. Choose either Script Body or Script File.

property-ui.label: Continue on fail
property-ui.description: Switch to control whether processing next SQL script should continue after failure.

property-ui.label: DB User Name
property-ui.description: The user name to be used to connect to the DB2 database.

property-ui.label: DB User Password
property-ui.description: The password to be used to connect to the DB2 database.

property-ui.label: DB Host
property-ui.description: Hostname of the DB2 server to connect to.

property-ui.label: DB Port
property-ui.description: The port number to connect to.

property-ui.label: Database Name
property-ui.description: The database name to connect to.

property-ui.label: DB2 JDBC Driver
property-ui.description: The path and filename of the IBM DB2 JDBC Driver (db2jcc.jar).

step-type.name: Run DB2 Command

property-ui.label: Command Body
property-ui.description: Enter the DB2 commands to execute. Choose either Command Body or Command File.

property-ui.label: Command File
property-ui.description: The path to a DB2 command file to execute, including the command file name. Choose either Command Body or Command File.

property-ui.label: Command Args
property-ui.description: The command arguments to pass into the DB2 Command Body or Command File.

property-ui.label: Escape Characters
property-ui.description: New line separated list of characters to escape.
